RemoveFromPredefinedButton.Tooltip: Remove Active Effect from the predefined Active Effects list

Transfer.Name: Apply Effect to Parent
Transfer.Hint: If checked, this Effect will be applied to any Actor or Item that owns this Effect's parent Item.

ConditionalModifierList.GroupFilterFormulaTitle: The formula should return the groups names separated with commas (,). If set, overrides the checkbox selection.

OptionsOrigin.DefaultValueTitle: This will be the selected key upon creation. Without one, an empty option will automatically be added to your dropdown field
OptionsOrigin.DynamicTableOptionKey: Column from the dynamic table to use as option key
OptionsOrigin.DynamicTableOptionLabel: Column from the dynamic table to use as option label
OptionsOrigin.ExpectedValueType: Expected value type: Array/Matrix (or String with comma-separated values)
OptionsOrigin.IfNotSet: If not set, will use the key-options instead

DynamicTable.CanAddRow: Can players add rows in the table?

Errors.DropdownOptionValidationError: Every option in the Dropdown must have a key

Actions.CopyChatCommandFailure: Please copy the command in the text box below. You can then paste it in the chat or use it in a chat macro.
Actions.CopyChatCommandSuccess: Chat command copied in clipboard! You can now paste it in the chat or use it in a chat macro!
Actions.CopyMacroScriptFailure: Please copy the script in the text box below. You can then use it in a script macro.
Actions.CopyMacroScriptSuccess: Macro script copied in clipboard! You can now use it in a script macro!

AddMacroDialog.MacroPageError: Please enter a page number between 1 and 5
AddMacroDialog.MacroSlotError: Please enter a slot number between 0 and 9
AddMacroDialog.Title: Add macro

Label.FontAwesomeIconDescription: You can use Font-Awesome icon names like 'dice-d20'. Check their website to discover their icon collection
Label.SendAltRollMessageToChat: Send alternative roll message to chat
Label.UseRichTextEditorForAltRollMessage: Use rich text editor for alternative roll message
Label.UseRichTextEditorForLabel: Use rich text editor for label
Label.UseRichTextEditorForRollMessage: Use rich text editor for roll message

ComponentProperties.MinimumPermission: Minimum permission to see the component
ComponentProperties.MinimumRole: Minimum role to see the component

NumberField.AllowRelativeModificationDescription: Entering '+5' will add 5 to the current value, for example
NumberField.ShowFieldControlsDescription: displays '+' and '-' buttons at the sides

RadioButton.GroupDescription: Will be used as a key in Formulas

Dialog.MissingData: Name and Key must not be empty

Tab.EnterNameAndKey: Please enter tab name and key.
Tab.MinimumPermission: Minimum permission to see the tab
Tab.MinimumRole: Minimum role to see the tab
Tab.NameAndKeyDescription: Name can be anything, key must be lowercase alphanumeric, and unique among tabs.
Tab.TabTooltip: Tab's tooltip (shown when hovering over the tab name)
Tab.VisibiltyFormulaDescription: Formula without ${}$. The tab will be visible if the Formula resolves to true.

Table.TableLayoutDescription: You can specify for each column, if it should be aligned left (l), right (r) or centered (c). Example for a 4-column table: 'cllr'

TextField.AutoCompleteDescription: This field should contain the autocomplete values separated with commas (,). It can contain formulas.

ComponentProperties.VisibiltyFormulaDescription: Component will be visible if the Formula resolves to true.

ImportDialog.Title: Import done
ImportDialog.Content: Import is done. The window will now reload.

Items.EmbeddedItemsFolderDescription: This folder contains all items embedded in game level items (items not embedded in an actor)

EditDialog.MissingData: Key and Formula must be entered for each modifier
EditDialog.Title: Configure modifiers
EditDialog.DeprecationWarning: Starting from version 4.5.0, Item and Status Effect modifiers are deprecated in favor of Active Effects, and will be removed in 6.0.0 and compatibility with Foundry 14.

ConversionDialog.Text:
Starting from version 4.5.0, Item and Status Effect modifiers are deprecated in favor of Active Effects, and will be removed in 6.0.0 and compatibility with Foundry 14.

Do you want to automatically convert Modifiers into Active Effects?

Caution, please back up your data before proceeding with the conversion.
ConversionDialog.Checkbox: Do not show this pop-up again (a system parameter is available to show this pop-up again)
ConversionDialog.OpenStatusConfiguration: Status Effects Modifier have been converted to Active Effects. Please review the Status Effects configuration to link the correct Active Effects to the Status

ProgressBar.ReloadingTemplatesFinished: CSB: Reloading Templates of Documents finished; reloaded {MAX} documents

ReloadTemplates.SelectReloadPlacesItems: Select in which places you want to reload your Items
ReloadTemplates.SelectReloadPlacesActors: Select in which places you want to reload your Actors

CustomActiveEffects.Name: Configure Active Effects
CustomActiveEffects.Hint: Configure predefined Active Effects which will be suggested in entities

CustomStatusEffects.Name: Configure Status Effects
CustomStatusEffects.Hint: Configure the quick status effects icons available on the tokens along with their behavior
CustomStatusEffects.StatusEffectInvalid: Every status effect needs to have an ID, a Name and an Icon.
CustomStatusEffects.SpecialStatusEffectInvalid: Special status effect {effect} is invalid. Either no status effect was configured, or the configured status effect does not exist.

ResetDialog.Title: Reset Status Effects Configuration?
ResetDialog.Content: Do you really want to reset the Status Effect configuration to its default state?

SpecialStatusEffects.Title: Special Status Effects
SpecialStatusEffects.Caption: These effects are used in various places in FoundryVTT. Please make sure they are all mapped to a status effect.

CustomStyle.Name: CSS Style file
CustomStyle.Hint: You can specify a custom styling file. If you want the default styling, leave blank. WARNING : Foundry does not allow uploading of CSS files. Please upload it manually to the server before selecting it here.

ExpandRollVisibility.Name: Expand Roll privacy to whole Chat messages
ExpandRollVisibility.Hint: If checked, roll privacy will affect the messages sent from sheets. This works using whispers.

RollIcons.Name: Roll Icons
RollIcons.Hint: You can specify a fontawesome icon name to add an icon next to the clickable labels in the sheet. Example : dice-d20 to display a d20 icon. If empty, no icon will be displayed.

ShowHiddenRolls.Name: Show hidden rolls
ShowHiddenRolls.Hint: This setting will show the hidden rolls to GMs for verification purposes.

LoggingLevel.Name: System Logging Level
LoggingLevel.Hint: Will log everything below the set level. On big systems, setting this on debug can slow down the interface.

MinimumRoleEditModifiers.Name: Minimum Role to edit Item Modifiers
MinimumRoleEditModifiers.Hint: The minimum role required to show and edit Item modifiers.

MinimumRoleTemplateReload.Name: Minimum Role to reload a sheet
MinimumRoleTemplateReload.Hint: The minimum role required to select a Template and reload a Sheet.

ManualEntitySaving.Name: Manual entity saving
ManualEntitySaving.Hint: On big sheets, you may want to disable automatic entity saving if sheet reloading takes too much time. This will add a save button to the sheets to manually save them. The sheets will be automatically saved when a linked item is added, deleted or saved, or when it is closed.

Show451ConversionPopUp.Name: Show Pop-up for the Modifier to Active Effect Conversion

ReloadSheetsDialog.Contents: Do you really want to reload all sheets linked to this template?
ReloadSheetsDialog.Title: Reload all linked sheets?

Dropdown.OptionsLengthError: {COMPONENT_KEY}: Key and Label-options are not of same length.

UserMessages.CannotMoveItemInItself: It is impossible to move an item inside itself
UserMessages.EmbeddedItemsFolderNotFound: Embedded items folder was not found. Please create an Item folder named {EMBEDDED_ITEMS_FOLDER_NAME}
UserMessages.ItemMaxDepth: Items cannot be nested more than {depth} levels deep.
UserMessages.ItemTemplateDeleted: Item template has been deleted for item {ITEM_NAME} - {ITEM_UUID} used in {ENTITY_NAME} - {ENTITY_UUID}

TabbedPanel.DuplicateTabKeEdit: Could not edit tab with duplicate key : {KEY}
TabbedPanel.DuplicateTabKey: Could not create tab with duplicate key : {KEY}

UserMessages.UserInputTemplateNotFound: User Input Template {TEMPLATE_NAME} was not found.
UserMessages.WrongDragOnTemplate: Only subtemplates items can be dragged on templates
